Title: Rare Havila Precision Pocketwatch in Original .800 Silver Hunter Case [A24]
Description: Super Rare Havila Pocket Watch in .800 Silver Hunter case (most of the Havila can only be found in open face case). I wound this watch (not fully) and it did run for about 9hrs and it kept time +/- 1 minute while on table top. Case hinges and locks are still tight. The crystal and face cover have had some chemical reaction which has caused whiting to silver and pitting to crystal which may be polished out, I have cut a piece of parchment paper to stop reaction from causing further damage. Measures 50.93mm across side to side and weighs 89.19grams [3.146 ounces] See photos for item you will receive. The [numbers] at end of description are only to ensure you receive the proper item. Free shipping to USA residents that includes tracking to your door. We ship for free only within the Continental US and only except PayPal.At Faces in Time we offer a full money back guarantee if the item is not as we described it or arrives broken. Simply notify us of your return and a refund will be granted upon its return to us. We ship all items within the US with a tracking # and ask any returns to shipped with tracking. Please take time to look at my other items for great buys on unique items
